argumentText:
ARGUMENT
r

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lpival.p | |- P = ( LPIdeal ` R ) |
| 2 |  | lpiss.u | |- U = ( LIdeal ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( r = R -> ( LIdeal ` r ) = ( LIdeal ` R ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( r = R -> ( LPIdeal ` r ) = ( LPIdeal ` R ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_eqeq12d | |- ( r = R -> ( ( LIdeal ` r ) = ( LPIdeal ` r ) <-> ( LIdeal ` R ) = ( LPIdeal ` R ) ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 1 | #P_eqeq12i | |- ( U = P <-> ( LIdeal ` R ) = ( LPIdeal ` R ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl6bbr | |- ( r = R -> ( ( LIdeal ` r ) = ( LPIdeal ` r ) <-> U = P ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_df-lpir | |- LPIR = { r e. Ring | ( LIdeal ` r ) = ( LPIdeal ` r ) } |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( R e. LPIR <-> ( R e. Ring /\ U = P ) ) |
